The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid or semi-arid environments. It produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are often pale green or yellow in color. Microspermum repens is a low-growing plant that spreads along the ground, forming dense mats that help prevent soil erosion.
